dialogue: Stop whatever you're doing and go research the answer to this question.
I don't have time to work on low-priority tasks.
Give me ten minutes to transform it into an emergency.
Brad is being unhelpful. I need you to talk to his boss.
I don't know, but obviously it's very important because it got escalated.
It must be an emergency because everyone is all worked up about it.
Now hum a happy tune or I'll complain about your attitude.
